short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show top-level comments with 'Q:' in them

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to 'grab' only the comments containing a question for Jazza's daily blog.


Disclaimer: 
This is an unofficial extension, made in hope of helping Jazza and his subscribers view questions more easily.

Please feel free to contact me in case of any issues regarding this extension.
